Base buttons

Use .btn-{color} class to set base button color.

<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary">Primary</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary">Secondary</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-success">Success</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-danger">Danger</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-warning">Warning</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-info">Info</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-dark">Dark</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-light">Light</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-white">White</button>

Soft style

Use .btn-soft-{color} class to set soft button color.

<button type="button" class="btn btn-soft-primary">Primary</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-soft-success">Success</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-soft-danger">Danger</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-soft-warning">Warning</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-soft-info">Info</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-soft-dark">Dark</button>

Outline button

Use .btn-outline-{color} class to have a button with outlined border style.

<button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-primary">Primary</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-secondary">Secondary</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-success">Success</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-danger">Danger</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-warning">Warning</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-info">Info</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-dark">Dark</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-light">Light</button>

Hover style

Use .btn-hover-{color} class to set a button with hover and active states.

<button type="button" class="btn btn-hover-primary">Primary</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-hover-secondary">Secondary</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-hover-success">Success</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-hover-danger">Danger</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-hover-warning">Warning</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-hover-info">Info</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-hover-dark">Dark</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-hover-light">Light</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-hover-white">White</button>

Hover soft style

Use .btn-hover-soft-{color} class to set a button with soft hover and active states.

<button type="button" class="btn btn-hover-soft-primary">Primary</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-hover-soft-success">Success</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-hover-soft-danger">Danger</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-hover-soft-warning">Warning</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-hover-soft-info">Info</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-hover-soft-dark">Dark</button>

Button colors

Use .btn-color-{color} and .btn-hover-color-{color} class to set button color and hover color.

<button type="button" class="btn btn-light btn-hover-color-primary">Primary</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-light btn-hover-color-success">Success</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-light btn-hover-color-danger">Danger</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-light btn-hover-color-warning">Warning</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-light btn-hover-color-info">Info</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-light btn-hover-color-dark">Dark</button>

Button text and icon colors

Use .btn-text-{color} and .btn-hover-text-{color} with .btn-icon-{color} and .btn-hover-icon-{color} to separately control text and icon color accordingly.

<button type="button" class="btn btn-light btn-hover-text-primary btn-hover-icon-primary">... Primary</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-light btn-hover-text-secondary btn-hover-icon-secondary">... Secondary</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-light btn-hover-text-success btn-hover-icon-success">... Success</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-light btn-hover-text-danger btn-hover-icon-danger">... Danger</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-light btn-hover-text-warning btn-hover-icon-warning">... Warning</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-light btn-hover-text-info btn-hover-icon-info">... Info</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-light btn-hover-text-dark btn-hover-icon-dark">... Dark</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-light btn-hover-text-light btn-hover-icon-light">... Light</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-light btn-hover-text-white btn-hover-icon-white">... White</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-light btn-hover-text-gray-100 btn-hover-icon-gray-100">... Gray-100</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-light btn-hover-text-gray-200 btn-hover-icon-gray-200">... Gray-200</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-light btn-hover-text-gray-300 btn-hover-icon-gray-300">... Gray-300</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-light btn-hover-text-gray-400 btn-hover-icon-gray-400">... Gray-400</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-light btn-hover-text-gray-500 btn-hover-icon-gray-500">... Gray-500</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-light btn-hover-text-gray-600 btn-hover-icon-gray-600">... Gray-600</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-light btn-hover-text-gray-700 btn-hover-icon-gray-700">... Gray-700</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-light btn-hover-text-gray-800 btn-hover-icon-gray-800">... Gray-800</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-light btn-hover-text-gray-900 btn-hover-icon-gray-900">... Gray-900</button>

Button with icon

Use .btn-icon for buttons with icon only.

<button type="button" class="btn btn-icon btn-sm btn-primary">...</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-icon btn-primary">...</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-icon btn-lg btn-primary">...</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-icon rounded-circle btn-sm btn-primary">...</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-icon rounded-circle btn-primary">...</button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-icon rounded-circle btn-lg btn-primary">...</button>

Base button

Use .btn-base and .btn-icon for base template buttons with transparent background and border.

<button type="button" class="btn btn-icon btn-base">...</button>

Icons

Use Remix Icons in combination with buttons as shown below.

<button type="button" class="btn btn-icon btn-primary"><i class="ri-image-line"></i></button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-icon btn-secondary"><i class="ri-image-line"></i></button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-icon btn-success"><i class="ri-image-line"></i></button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-icon btn-warning"><i class="ri-image-line"></i></button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-icon btn-danger"><i class="ri-image-line"></i></button>
<button type="button" class="btn btn-icon btn-info"><i class="ri-image-line"></i></button>
